description: Paul and Cody have become the best of friends so good that Cody sort of stole Paul from his loving girlfriend. He used his ass to divert Pauls attention and now has him firmly in his grasp and is now on the end of Pauls sizable cock. Good thing Codys last name is Ryder, because thats what he did a lot of. Good thing for Paul his favorite sport is baseball, because he was certainly pitching a no hitter.
title: Perfect Fit
